channel.title: Masters on Stats On the T
channel.description: Recent content in Masters on Stats On the T

item.title: Clutch Stats from the Sunshine Masters
item.description: As the tours head into the clay court season, who should be buoyed the most by their mental toughness during Indian Wells and Miami?

item.title: Is the Changing of the Guard Coming?
item.description: The Next Gen have been center stage throughout the Sunshine Masters this year. How can we size up the success of the young guns? And what does their success mean for the rest of the 2018 season?

item.title: Forecasts for the 2018 Miami Masters Title
item.description: After a near perfect first quarter of the season, Roger Federer enters the Miami Masters with a 50-50 chance of winning the title, thanks in part to the luck of the draw. Who are the other biggest male and female contenders for the Key Biscayne title?
